original_title: 明るい笑顔！たぷたぷの胸！ヌキあり！で下半身を癒してくれる銭湯の看板娘
overview: A public bath in a certain place in Tokyo that is crowded with regular customers. There is a signboard girl who offers a little naughty service to heal the tiredness of customers! You can wash your back with the milk that overflows from the T-shirt that is soaked with sweat and soap, and thoroughly wash your back with the thick vagina! Aimi who makes me ejaculate innocently is very cute!
title: Bright Smile! Soft Tits! Happy Endings! The Girl From The Public Bath Will Take Care Of You
